ValidationRule.description: Req #3287 Opportunity record type change from direct to indirect
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NF_Facilitator_Notified__c = true , ISCHANGED( RecordTypeId ), OR( RecordTypeId = $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, RecordTypeId = $Label.Direct_Opportunity ) , OR( PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Indirect_Opportunity, PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId )= $Label.Direct_Opportunity ), NOT( OR( $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator', $Profile.Name = 'Data Loader Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Nokia Admin Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Global Process Admin Profile' ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to change the Opportunity record type after the G3 Facilitator is Notified.
